maxServerMeta.description:
The maximum number of metadata key-value pairs that can be supplied
per server for the project.

maxPersonality.description:
The maximum number of file path and content pairs that can be
supplied on server build and rebuild for the project.

maxImageMeta.description: The maximum number of key-value pairs per image for the project.

maxPersonalitySize.description:
The maximum size, in bytes, for each personality file that is
guaranteed to apply to all images in the project. Providers can set
additional per-image personality limits.

maxTotalRAMSize.description:
The maximum total amount of RAM, in MB, for all servers at any one
time for the project.

maxTotalKeypairs.description: The maximum number of key pairs per server for the project.

maxSecurityGroupRules.description:
The maximum number of security group rules per security group for
the project.

maxServerGroups.description: The maximum number of server groups per server for the project.

totalRAMUsed.description: Total RAM, in MB, used for all servers at any one time.

maxSecurityGroups.description: The maximum number of security groups per server for the project.

maxServerGroupMembers.description:
The maximum number of server group members per server group for the
project.

maxTotalFloatingIps.description:
The maximum number of floating IP addresses for the project.

These IPs must be allocated from the central pool before you can
use them. To allocate a floating IP to a project, see Associate
floating IP addresses .

maxTotalInstances.description: The maximum number of servers at any one time for the project.

maxTotalCores.description: The maximum number of cores for the project.
